title: #740 - Nick Turturro
description:
Nick Turturro, an actor seen in "Blue Bloods" and host of the "Breaking Bread" podcast, joins Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt live in studio.

This podcast is brought to you by:
 
Behind The Irishman podcast - Go behind the scenes with host Sebastian Maniscalco and learn about Martin Scorsese's new Netflix movie "The Irishman." http://smarturl.it/behindtheirishman

Onnit.com - Use Promo code CHURCH for a 10% discount at checkout.
